name: A quest for free stuff
description:
Today is the day! Freebies at the local store. All you have to do is leave the house, leave the village, and enter the shop, that's all gonna be easy, right?

A quest for free stuff follows the protagonist, as they have to solve puzzles in order to get their free stuff. This game was created for a game jam, so whilst it's not very long, there's still lots of character in the puzzles and the characters! Follow the protagonist on their adventure to solve crimes and free ancient demons, all for some freebies.
